name: Microsoft Media Catalog
summary: Learn about .MMC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: An example of an MMC file is the "Artgal50.mmc" catalog file, which contains images, keywords, and thumbnail previews used by Clip Gallery.

description: Contains a collection of images (such as a clipart gallery) or other media in an organized format; typically saved in the \Application Data\Microsoft\Media Catalog directory.
